mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_sys_menu (createtime, deleted, description, displayno, functioncode, menucode, `name`, parentid, `state`, url) values (#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{functioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_sys_menu set createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displayno = #{displayno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, functioncode = #{functioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menucode = #{menucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, createtime, deleted, description, displayno, functioncode, menucode, `name`, parentid, `state`, url from user_sys_menu where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, createtime, deleted, description, displayno, functioncode, menucode, `name`, parentid, `state`, url from user_sys_menu
